message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its high value and the effort put into creating it, I am offering it to you for $15000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the potential return on investment for you. I look forward to your consideration.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, and I'm interested in acquiring it. However, I was thinking more along the lines of a price in the range of $12000 to $13000. This would be more in line with my budget and would allow me to get the most value out of this investment. Would you be willing to consider this price range?
